pageContext.claim: “We've been actually putting a lot of money into [John Lewis's district], because, I mean, Georgia's coming a long way under this administration, and when you have crime, you have crime. There's nothing you can do about it in terms of statistics.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has criticized Lewis’s district in the past, but the claim was unfounded then. It was named the city where African Americans are doing the best in 2015. The crime rate has been declining for decades.
